updates.HtmlString: Updated marketing cards to be more accurate for set, plus set chances as 1:3 token:marketing for core sets, 2:3 for expansions, and 9:1 as of Battle for Zendikar.
Updated foil chances. Now 15/67 chance a booster has a foil, includes basic lands, and staring with this set, it always replaces a common.
Upgraded to newest version, added all promos, Prerelease pack-ins, and the Fat Pack.
Fixed Silverblade Paladin: Was Uncommon instead of Rare.
